mapper.select: SELECT t1.quoted_id, t1.vehicle_info_id, t1.driver_info_id, t2.real_name, t2.telphone, t2.status, t3.plate_number, t3.type, t3.length, t4.account_id FROM zh_quoted_plus_info t1, zh_real_driver_info t2, zh_real_vehicle_info t3, zh_quoted_info t4 where t1.vehicle_info_id = t3.vehicle_info_id and t1.driver_info_id = t2.driver_info_id and t4.quoted_id = t1.quoted_id and t4.source_id = #{sourceId}

SELECT zoli.load_id, zodi.order_id, zodi.order_no, zqi.price, zai.account_id AS account_account_id, zai.telphone AS account_telphone, zaia.idno AS account_idno, zaia.real_name AS account_real_name, zaia.id_f_image_ref_id AS account_id_f_image_ref_id, zaia.id_b_image_ref_id AS account_id_b_image_ref_id, zaia.bus_image_ref_id AS account_bus_image_ref_id, zrvi.vehicle_info_id AS vehicle_vehicle_info_id, zrvi.plate_number AS vehicle_plate_number, zrvi.license_image_ref_id AS vehicle_license_image_ref_id, zrvi.license_image_2_ref_id AS vehicle_license_image_2_ref_id, zrvi.oc_image_ref_id AS vehicle_oc_image_ref_id, zrvi.oc_image_2_ref_id AS vehicle_oc_image_2_ref_id, zrvi.oc_image_3_ref_id AS vehicle_oc_image_3_ref_id, zrvpi.vi_image_ref_id AS vehicle_vi_image_ref_id, zrvpi.ci_image_ref_id AS vehicle_ci_image_ref_id, zldi.driver_info_id AS driver_driver_info_id, zldi.is_major AS driver_is_major, zrdi.real_name AS driver_real_name, zrdi.telphone AS driver_telphone, zrdi.idno AS driver_idno, zrdi.id_f_image_ref_id AS driver_id_f_image_ref_id, zrdi.id_b_image_ref_id AS driver_id_b_image_ref_id, zrdi.driving_f_image_ref_id AS driver_driving_f_image_ref_id, zrdi.qualifi_image_ref_id as driver_qualifi_image_ref_id, zrdi.qualifi_image_2_ref_id as driver_qualifi_image_2_ref_id FROM zh_order_load_info zoli INNER JOIN zh_order_detail_info zodi ON zodi.order_id = zoli.order_id INNER JOIN ( zh_load_driver_info zldi INNER JOIN zh_real_driver_info zrdi ON zrdi.driver_info_id = zldi.driver_info_id ) ON zoli.load_id = zldi.load_id INNER JOIN ( zh_quoted_info zqi INNER JOIN ( zh_account_info zai INNER JOIN zh_agent_info zaia ON zaia.account_id = zai.account_id ) ON zai.account_id = zqi.account_id ) ON zqi.quoted_id = zoli.quoted_id INNER JOIN ( zh_real_vehicle_info zrvi INNER JOIN zh_real_vehicle_plus_info zrvpi ON zrvi.vehicle_info_id = zrvpi.vehicle_info_id ) ON zrvi.vehicle_info_id = zoli.vehicle_info_id WHERE zoli.load_id = #{loadId}
